list.name: UTILITY-BELT
list.description: Buster heals himself and all nearby allies for x health for each ally in his Super's charge area.
list.descriptionHtml: Buster heals himself and all nearby allies for x health for each ally in his Super's charge area.

list.name: SLO-MO-REPLAY
list.description: Buster's next Lens Flare pulls enemies towards him.
list.descriptionHtml: Buster's next Lens Flare pulls enemies towards him.
